class_description: Explore the art of songwriting, from lyric creation to melody composition. Suitable for aspiring songwriters of all levels.

instructor.instructor_bio: Award-winning songwriter and experienced music producer.

equipment_requirements: Students need access to a computer or tablet with a stable internet connection and optional musical instrument for practice.

class_description: Learn the basics of creating electronic music, from synthesizers to digital audio workstations (DAWs). No prior experience required.

instructor.instructor_bio: Electronic music producer with a focus on innovation and creativity.

class_curriculum: Introduction to synthesizers and electronic instruments
Final project: Creating an original electronic track
class_materials: Computer with a digital audio workstation (DAW)
equipment_requirements: Students need access to a computer with a digital audio workstation and a stable internet connection.

class_description: Enhance your vocal skills and stage presence, suitable for singers of all levels. Focus on breath control, pitch, and expressive performance.

instructor.instructor_bio: Vocal coach and professional singer with a versatile vocal range.

equipment_requirements: Students need access to a computer or tablet with a stable internet connection and a webcam for virtual performances.

class_description: Build a strong foundation in music theory, covering key concepts such as scales, chords, and harmony. Suitable for all musicians.

instructor.instructor_bio: Music educator with a passion for simplifying complex music theory concepts.

class_curriculum: Application of music theory in composition
equipment_requirements: Students need access to a computer or tablet with a stable internet connection and a virtual piano for interactive learning.

class_description: Immerse yourself in the world of acoustic folk singing, focusing on traditional and contemporary folk songs. All vocal levels welcome.

instructor.instructor_bio: Folk singer-songwriter with a deep connection to traditional acoustic music.

class_curriculum: Exploring traditional and contemporary folk songs
Developing a unique folk singing style
equipment_requirements: Students need access to a computer or tablet with a stable internet connection and backing tracks for practice.

class_description: Dive into the world of jazz improvisation, covering scales, chord progressions, and improvisational techniques. Prior knowledge of basic music theory recommended.

instructor.instructor_bio: Jazz pianist and composer with extensive experience in improvisation.

class_prerequisites: Basic understanding of music theory, familiarity with jazz standards
equipment_requirements: Students need access to a computer or tablet with a stable internet connection, a musical instrument (preferably a piano, guitar, or saxophone), and backing tracks for improvisation.

class_description: Embark on your journey of learning the flute, covering essential techniques and simple melodies. No prior flute experience required.

instructor.instructor_bio: Flutist and music educator specializing in beginner flute instruction.

class_curriculum: Introduction to music notation for flute
equipment_requirements: Students need access to a computer or tablet with a stable internet connection and a flute (student-grade or rental) for practice.

class_description: Immerse yourself in the vibrant world of Latin percussion, covering various instruments and rhythmic patterns. Suitable for all percussion enthusiasts.

instructor.instructor_bio: Percussionist and expert in Latin percussion ensemble performance.

class_curriculum: Introduction to various Latin percussion instruments
Performance of popular Latin percussion compositions
equipment_requirements: Students need access to a computer or tablet with a stable internet connection and Latin percussion instruments for practice.

class_description: Unlock the secrets of playing the bass guitar, from groovy basslines to advanced techniques. Suitable for bassists of all skill levels.

instructor.instructor_bio: Renowned bassist with extensive experience in various music genres.

class_prerequisites: Basic understanding of guitar or music theory
class_curriculum: Jam sessions and live performance tips
equipment_requirements: Students need access to a computer or tablet with a stable internet connection and a bass guitar with amplifier or headphones for practice.

class_description: Explore the art of harmonizing melodies and creating lush chords in jazz piano. Recommended for intermediate to advanced pianists.

instructor.instructor_bio: Jazz pianist and composer known for intricate harmonic arrangements.

class_prerequisites: Proficiency in basic jazz piano skills
equipment_requirements: Students need access to a computer or tablet with a stable internet connection and an acoustic or digital piano/keyboard for practice.

class_description: Immerse yourself in the diverse rhythms and percussion techniques from around the world. No prior drumming experience required.

instructor.instructor_bio: Percussionist with a passion for world music and cross-cultural collaboration.

class_curriculum: Introduction to various world percussion instruments
Group performance of world music compositions
equipment_requirements: Students need access to a computer or tablet with a stable internet connection and world percussion instruments (djembe, congas, etc.) for practice.

class_description: Dive into the world of digital music production, covering software, sound design, and advanced production techniques. Suitable for all levels.

instructor.instructor_bio: Producer and sound engineer specializing in electronic and hip-hop genres.

class_prerequisites: Basic understanding of music production software
class_curriculum: Final project: Producing an original track
class_materials: Computer with a digital audio workstation (DAW)
equipment_requirements: Students need access to a computer with a digital audio workstation and a stable internet connection.
